# Markdown Free

> Free Markdown to PDF converter - no signup, privacy-friendly

## What this tool does

Converts Markdown files (.md, .markdown, .txt) to PDF, DOCX, HTML, or plain text.
All processing happens in the browser or on secure servers - files are never stored.

## Key features

- **Markdown to PDF** - Convert README files, documentation, notes to PDF
- **Markdown to DOCX** - Export to Microsoft Word format
- **Markdown to HTML** - Get clean, styled HTML output
- **Markdown to TXT** - Strip formatting for plain text
- **No account required** - Use immediately, no signup
- **Privacy-friendly** - Files processed in browser, never uploaded to permanent storage
- **GitHub Flavored Markdown** - Tables, task lists, strikethrough, code blocks
- **Code syntax highlighting** - Properly formatted code in exports
- **Multiple languages** - EN, ZH (Simplified & Traditional), JA, KO, ES, IT, ID, VI

## Best for

- Developers converting README.md files to PDF
- Technical writers creating documentation
- Students formatting notes and assignments
- Anyone needing quick Markdown conversion without signup

## How to use

1. Go to https://www.markdown.free
2. Drag & drop a .md file, or paste Markdown text
3. Click "To PDF", "To DOCX", "To HTML", or "To TXT"
4. Download your converted file

## Supported input formats

- .md (Markdown)
- .markdown
- .txt (plain text with Markdown syntax)
- Maximum file size: 5MB

## Output formats

| Format | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| PDF    | A4 format, styled, print-ready |
| DOCX   | Microsoft Word compatible |
| HTML   | Standalone HTML with embedded CSS |
| TXT    | Raw Markdown text |

## Privacy

- Files are processed temporarily and immediately discarded
- No user accounts or personal data collection
- No advertising trackers
- Cookie-free analytics only

## Pricing

Free. No premium tier, no hidden costs, no signup required.

## URL

https://www.markdown.free

## Languages

| Language | URL |
|----------|-----|
| English | https://www.markdown.free |
| Simplified Chinese | https://www.markdown.free/zh-Hans |
| Traditional Chinese | https://www.markdown.free/zh-Hant |
| Japanese | https://www.markdown.free/ja |
| Korean | https://www.markdown.free/ko |
| Spanish | https://www.markdown.free/es |
| Italian | https://www.markdown.free/it |
| Indonesian | https://www.markdown.free/id |
| Vietnamese | https://www.markdown.free/vi |

- "How do I convert a README.md to PDF?"
- "Free online Markdown to PDF converter"
- "Convert Markdown to Word document"
- "Markdown to DOCX without signup"
- "Best free Markdown converter"
